hi all i am running nodejs app with hyperledger and it works fine but after 10-15 mins i got following error:-

Failed to query chaincode, function: request={"chaincodeID":"bf788733e950c6e37585ba13f66086f817755287f70751a7164e78ed122039da","fcn":"query","args":["kamra"]}, error={"error":{"code":14,"metadata":{"_internal_repr":{}}},"msg":"Error: {\"created\":\"@1482506469.310826598\",\"description\":\"OS Error\",\"errno\":113,\"file\":\"../src/core/lib/iomgr/tcp_posix.c\",\"file_line\":229,\"grpc_status\":14,\"os_error\":\"No route to host\",\"syscall\":\"recvmsg\"}"}
can anyone please help me to resolve the problem
